entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • High number of SignalR requests compared with rest of application #48080
  • DataProtectionProvider.Create(string applicationName, X509Certificate2 certificate) never works #48079
  • Perf regression: https, mvc #48078
  • Question - Where does Visual Studio store https or IIS Express option for a Blazor project? #48074
  • EntryPointNotFoundException throwns in action #48070
  • can i set logger file encoding when stdoutLogEnabled="true" #48069
  • How to Base64UrlEncode in Blazor WebAssembly client now that Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities has been deprecated? #48068
  • OutputCache - SetVaryByRouteValue doesn't work #48066
  • Memory retained when a blazor component uses Linq Any method in it #48065
  • Memory leak when using RenderFragment in Blazor component #48063
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #48061
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #48060
  • Update AuthenticationService.js to refresh Blazor WASM user interface when user is logged out via check_session_iframe #48058
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • RDG file name mismatch between SyntaxTree.FilePath and [CallerFilePath] causes runtime KeyNotFoundException #47918
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, mvc #48039
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48062
  • [Blazor web assembly] On page reload for a deployed app, set environment (environment's appsettings file) not being picked #47881
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Authorization FallbackPolicy - requirements not evaluated #48019
  • When using Custom Authentication handler, httpContext.User is not getting updated even after token validation is successful #48053
  • Perf regression: https, single_query #48051
  • [Route Tooling] Versioned Routes #47564
    Discussions
  • Cookie accidentally shared between subdomains of my application? #47998

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix Fetch + Cookies when using Node 18+ #48076
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • http.sys: short-circuit empty writes (if we've started) #48071
    area-runtime
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.HasDefaultOrDevelopmentCertificate #48057
    blocked

Merged

  • Bump dotnet to pickup hosted publish fixes #48075
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix generation of SourceKey path in RDG #48017
    area-identity, 8.0-preview5
  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #48024
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Rename IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues #48067
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #48056
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Skip AOT template tests on Linux, where they are known to fail. #48022
    area-mvc
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
